title: A little about Riven

Riven is a champion with high defensive abilities, high mobility, high damage, 2 hard CC abilities, free %AD, and a ranged execute ult. That's what she is. Her kit is stupid.

You are wrong. Riven got 1 defensive ability and not several. Her long range movement is slower than Udyr, her engage is slower than basically any assassin only her in fight movement is actually high.
Her hard CC is very short in total, it's basically interrupts. One of those interrupts is extremely easy to interrupt aswell which means it offers outplay potential aka counterplay. "Free" is such an awesome description, you could add it to anything. Irelia got "free" true damage. Great. What does it mean? Nothing, but it surely sounds nice.
And yes, Riven has got an ultimate with mediocre cooldown and a slow projectile.
She invests a huge amount of gold into CD which means that she got all her basic abilities up all the time - which also means she loses a huge amount of power (gold) when CCd - compared to eg Talon who uses all his skills and doesn't really care if he gets CCd afterwards.

Riven got no true damage, no % damage to deal with tanks (ult is %missing and not a proper trading tool to wear down tanks), no range skills to cs when zoned, no escape after her all-in which is quite bad for an assassin, plays bad when behind (that's why Riven feeds so often, even those OTP challenger Riven players have some games in which they feed).
Riven needs a full rework as badly as Aatrox, her kit is every bit as toxic, even when she's balanced she's overbearing to deal with.
Yeah she's not hard to deal with, but having to play so cautiously is really damn boring.
